casebody.data:
FEDERAL TRADE COMMISSION v. BRECHT CANDY COMPANY. No. 1612. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Oct. 21, 1937. W. T. Kelley, Chief Counsel, Federal Trade Commission, Martin A. Morrison. Asst. Chief Counsel, Henry C. Lank and James W. Nichol, Sp. Atty., all of Washington, D. C., for petitioner.

Before LEWIS and PHILLIPS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirming order of Federal Trade Commission.
